statement.name: INSERT_SMARQT
statement.desc: Inserción tabla de Respuesta de Custionarios
statement.sql: INSERT INTO smarqt( nrorqt, nroqst, tpoqst, nroans, nroscv, nrotry, shwcta, nroqkt, ntarqt, codrqt, txtans) VALUES (?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?)

statement.name: INSERT_SMAQKT
statement.desc: Inserción tabla de Respuesta de Custionarios
statement.sql: INSERT INTO smaqkt( nroqkt, nroprs, codqkt, tpoqkt, fchqkt, horqkt, sqlbkr, nroqtr ) VALUES (?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?)

statement.name: INSERT_SMANQT
statement.desc: Inserción tabla de Respuesta de Custionarios
statement.sql: INSERT INTO smanqt( nronqt,codcia, nroqtr, tpoprs, codprs, ntanqt, fchnqt, nrotry, sqlbkr) VALUES (?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?)
